TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Mawring_Ku, title = Mawring_Ku, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mawring_Ku} }

S.FORM: Mawring Ku mki sku Takaw Si. su'unun kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 241.39 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 109.93 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 40.14 km²), 1,896 hi ku su'unun kwara alang hi kya, 581 buwan ku kwarakya, tiku sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga 1,797 hi, kyala kwara pinspung s'uli ga 95%. kwara sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga Taywang Gyencumin na Rukay ku smrrhu ku pyux s'uli taya kya. ays ptyaw sebu Mawring Ku ays psgayun 3 ru 3 alang. 3 alang hani ga, Teldreka , 'Oponoho , Kungadavane .

Mawring Ko mki sko Takaw Si. so'onon kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 241.39 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 109.93 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 40.14 km²), 1,896 hi ko so'onon kwara alang hi kya, 581 bowan ko kwarakya, tiko sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga 1,797 hi, kyala kwara pinspong s'oli ga 95%. kwara sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga Taywang Gyencomin na Rokay ko smrrho ko pyox s'oli taya kya. ays ptyaw sebo Mawring Ko ays psgayon 3 ro 3 alang. 3 alang hani ga, Teldreka , 'Oponoho , Kongadavane .
